description: This file defines a CatalogAPI module for interacting with media data, including fetching trending media, searching, retrieving details, recommendations, and batch info, primarily for anime and manga, using GraphQL and mapping functions.

methods.name: getTrendingMedia
methods.description: Fetches trending media items of specified type, page, and perPage count, with fallback to mock data on failure.

methods.name: searchMedia
methods.description: Searches media by query string, with fallback to mock data if search fails.

methods.name: getMediaDetails
methods.description: Retrieves detailed information about a media item by its ID, with fallback to mock data.

methods.name: getRecommendations
methods.description: Fetches media recommendations based on a media ID.

methods.name: getMinimalByIds
methods.description: Retrieves minimal info for a list of media IDs, including fallback to mock data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Returns trending media list, compatible with existing UI.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Alias for getMediaDetails, retrieves media info by ID.
